Reviews.Title: Very Professional
Reviews.Author: arun "arun"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for $925.12. After 8 days I noticed that price dropped nearly a $100. I went to my orders and clicked "return item" and mentioned the reason. I immediately got an email saying Return request closed and the reason being "Refund without return".  Next day I got Refund on order for $120. I had researched DavisMAX before buying and based on the reviews, I purchased this because of positive reviews and also it was the best deal i could find. Completely satisfied with the professional handling of the customer query.Now, as far as the product is concerned, The instant i opened the box, i found all the canon products in their original packing. Unboxed them and immediately registered the product on canon website with the serial numbers (body and both the lens). Overall satisfied with the cannon stuff I got. As far as the other bundled items go, the bag is of a good quality, I liked the compactness of the big tripod, i never had a chance to test out the effectiveness of the 3 filters or the 2 extra lens attachments(wide angle and 2x). The additional battery with car charger was a plus.Regarding the cons, I would have preferred an USM lens for the 75-300mm. It is hardly $40 more and i would have definitely paid that extra $$$. The bundled 75-300mm is not USM but i bought it anyway because if i buy them separately the cost was going to be around $1000.Another thing this bundle is missing is the 40mm pancake lens, it about $135  but worth the price addition because it would really compliment the worlds smallest SLR body with the smallest lens and u would literally have point and shoot camera size which gives an amazing quality. I am buying the "Canon EF 40mm f/2.8 STM Lens", will check if DavisMAX has it or else will order from some other vendor or amazon.

Reviews.Title: Canon SL1
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This camera is my first DSLR and it exceeds my expectations.I had avoided buying a DSLR  in the past because I was afraid of the weight. This camera fits my needs exactly. It will be great for travel. The kit included many useful accessories. I have already recommended this camera to my friends.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Someone
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, just got it last week, went on a trip where the kids had to ride roller coasters, I was able to take shots of them in the fast moving roller coaster, great pictures. I took some pictures at night, I love them. It is my first DSLR, I am not an expert in photography but wanted to take some good pictures for family memories. The auto focus and image stabilization options were very helpful in taking those shots for a fast moving roller coaster where I had to move along from one side to another and take quick shots. Didn't have to worry about focusing. Light weight, but when the lens is added, it is a little heavier. Normal I guess since it is not a point and shoot camera

Reviews.Title: Enter a new world
Reviews.Author: palaeologus "nipponophile"
Reviews.Content: A great choice for first-time DSLR users -- start with program modes and work into using manual settings as the art of photography takes hold.  Good accessory pack contains many items that come in handy for novices.  Deducted one star for how cheap the carrying-case zipper has been.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad package but you'll need a few extras
Reviews.Author: James Daniels
Reviews.Content: My only issue with this package is the two smaller lens don't have the rings needed to connect to the lens. I contacted the seller and was given the answer of feel free to browse our online catalog to see if we offer those.

Reviews.Title: Good camera package
Reviews.Author: Jill
Reviews.Content: I would have only done 4 stars, but I love the camera so much, I just explain what I didn't care fore in here.First, I believe this is a wonderful starter package for those that are just starting to get into the DSLR camera. The camera functions wonderfully. I am not having any issues with the lens that come with it. I love  the quality of the pictures this camera takes. I have smaller hands, so I also like the size of the camera as well. I like how it has a built in flash and also a mount for a larger flash.I like that it comes with the three filters for the lens. I just got to learn how to use them.I like that is comes with an extra memory card because I filled my extra for my point and shoot camera right away.What I didn't like was that the tripod is of very cheap quality, both the mini and the large, so I will not use it for this application, I'll just use it for my video camera. I would recommend that you do not rely on the large tripod for your camera. And the mini one, don't even bother using it. the camera with the lens is too heavy for it, so it's pointless.I don't care for the quality of the extra battery. The life of it is half to the life of the Canon battery. It is good for a spare while you are waiting for the Canon battery to charge again. But I would do your research on getting a better quality after you get the camera for spare if you do a lot of picture taking.The bag, well, lets just say it's good for just getting by until you get one that has more storage compartments and dividers. I will use this bag for my video camera once I find I more suitable bag for my growing collection on camera equipment

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: lanie decamara
Reviews.Content: i went to SAMS and found this camera for 799 with only the two lens and a case!! so i was really happy when i found this but wasn't to sure!!! well i am absently happy with this package deal!! everything i needed in it!!

Reviews.Title: Lightweight, excellent camera, great price!
Reviews.Author: Todd A. Klein
Reviews.Content: I was going to buy a more expensive camera, when a professional photographer actually recommeded this one. He said that the more expesive professional camera's were heavier, hard on the wrist after a long day. He was right! I love this camera. In fact, I'm buying a second one so my wife can take pictures also. This is an excellent package with FOUR lenses. LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: Small but big on Value
Reviews.Author: Edwin J. Lloyd Jr.
Reviews.Content: Best way to purchase your equipment by buying it with all the extra gear you'll possibly need.  Canon the leader of the pac

Reviews.Title: Excited
Reviews.Author: Jim Reed
Reviews.Content: Delighted with the camera and all the "fixings." Ready to be excited about some serious photography again.Utah canyons--here we come!

Reviews.Title: Good camera, bad bag
Reviews.Author: Chris Frain
Reviews.Content: The camera it's self is very light and shoots high quality photos. The only problem I found was the bag, it had no compartments for the camera, lenses and accessories. Otherwise, a very good camera bundle for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: David Huff
Reviews.Content: Products work, shipping awesome, great pricing! Able to use this camera right out of the box, great pictures without a lot of learning.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product and service from Seller!
Reviews.Author: Louise O'Rourke
Reviews.Content: This camera was a gift to my daughter who owns other cameras and she is exploring all new ways to enhance her photography hobby. Easy to use and learn new techniques. Quality of digital photos is great.

Reviews.Title: Great camera and accessories
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I've been very happy with this purchase. It ended up being just what I was looking for in a dslr.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel SL1 18mp
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It is a big learning curve for me. Did not receive the strap to the carry case. Everything else was in the box.

Reviews.Title: Honest-to-goodness best deal ever!
Reviews.Author: Mark Farmer
Reviews.Content: I'll be honest, when it really came down to making this purchase I had done nothing short of extensive research - This Camera was definitely the one for my wife! I looked high and low for a reliable outfit to get the camera from. When I came across DavisMAX and saw how much came along with the camera, and with such an affordable pricetag I'll admit I was a little skeptical - "How can they sell me a camera that alone costs much more for just the body alone than for what they include with it?!"... Well I sent for it, low and behold it showed up on my front porch! So happy with this purchase - I tell all my friends and family to check DavisMAX when looking for cameras!
